name: ethereum-to-kasplex-guide
description: Complete guide for deploying Ethereum contracts to Kasplex L2 with zero code changes

scripts.setup: echo 'Setting up examples with ethers v5 compatibility...' && cd examples/01-hello-world && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../02-erc20-standard && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.clean: cd examples/01-hello-world && npm run clean && cd ../02-erc20-standard && npm run clean

author: Merlin / Zorglub4242
